title: Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw for Sports and Travel, BPA-Free, 32oz, Dreamy Field
descriptions:
Introducing the Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw - your ultimate companion for sports and travel! With a capacity of 32oz, this sleek bottle is perfect for keeping you hydrated throughout your active day.

Crafted from premium stainless steel and insulated with a double-wall design, this bottle ensures that your beverage stays cold for up to an impressive 24 hours. No more lukewarm water or melted ice!

The FreeSip spout offers the best of both worlds - a built-in straw for easy sipping and a swig opening for those who prefer a traditional mouthful. The push-button lid with lock provides secure closure, making it perfect for on-the-go adventures. And don't worry about cleaning - the bottle is hand washable while the lid conveniently goes in the dishwasher!

Safety is our top priority. This water bottle is BPA-free and phthalate-free, ensuring your peace of mind as you use it daily. It's not recommended for hot liquids, but for all your cold beverage needs - this Owala bottle has got you covered!

Available in sizes 24oz, 32oz, and 40oz, find the one that suits your lifestyle best. Your new favorite water bottle comes with a limited lifetime warranty, so invest in it today and enjoy the journey to better hydration!

**Advertising Description:**

Introducing the Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw - your ultimate companion for sports and travel adventures! With a capacity of 32oz, this Dreamy Field bottle keeps your favorite beverages cold for up to 24 hours, thanks to its advanced double-wall insulation technology.

Crafted from premium stainless steel, this sleek and stylish water bottle is not only durable but also BPA-free and phthalate-free, ensuring your health and safety. The FreeSip spout offers the convenience of a built-in straw and a swig opening for easy sipping, while the push-button lid with lock ensures secure transport during your active lifestyle.

Hand wash the bottle and dishwasher-safe lid for effortless cleaning, and enjoy the added benefits of a wide opening that accommodates ice cubes and makes filling a breeze. The carry loop doubles as a lock, keeping your bottle securely closed when on the go.

Available in sizes of 24oz, 32oz, and 40oz, this versatile water bottle is perfect for any adventure. Embrace the freedom of hydration with the Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle - your new essential for sports, travel, and everyday life!
